channel.title: Aaditya's Space
channel.description: This website is a virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Optimized prime miner
item.description: My Take on Optimization - Optimized prime miner I used the Square Root Theorem for Primality Testing as the base program. It works by taking the new number’s square root and checking if prime numbers less than the root can divide it. If they cannot, it is prime. The program’s goal is to compute as...

item.title: Tug of war game
item.description: A button dexterity game with esp32 - Tug of war game The tug of war game is a button dexterity game. A 2 player game with induidual controllers, that you can spectate through a web interface. Overview of the game The goal of the game is simple: Player 1 and Player 2 each press their respective button...

item.title: ESP32 macropad
item.description: My own customisable bluetooth deck - ESP32 MACROPAD A macropad is a physical device with buttons that are mapped to some customizable functions. It is used to enhance productivity, for navigating software, playing games or all of these at once. I have made my own version of it using the blekeyboard library and the esp32. Components...

item.title: Quotelet
item.description: My own customisable bluetooth deck - An automated A.I. channel For the past year we’ve seen a lot of A.I. generated content on youtube. Now there is a difference between A.I. generated and automation we must understand first, A.I. (artificial intelligence) generated content is the content A.I. thinks of, for example a script for a video,...
